cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level dev to learn advanced state management and PWA concepts from Lead.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required for baseline plan, but an option for acceleration.
cost_optimization: Current team is sufficient and well-balanced.
future_scaling: Can absorb minor scope increases; major increases would require another Mid-level developer.

cross_training_opportunities: Cross-train DevOps Lead on NestJS basics to assist with API maintenance.
contractor_augmentation_option: A part-time NestJS developer could be hired to offload non-critical tasks.
cost_optimization: High risk of bottleneck. Augmentation may be required to de-risk timeline.
future_scaling: Cannot scale without adding another backend developer.

cross_training_opportunities: Train Backend Lead on CI/CD pipeline maintenance and Terraform basics.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required unless lead is unavailable.
cost_optimization: Current resource is sufficient but is a single point of failure.
future_scaling: Cannot scale without adding another DevOps engineer.
